mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE (employee_num, store_num, employee_name, id, password, email, phone_num, job_level, hire_date, hire_type, auth) VALUES (#{employee_num}, #{store_num}, #{employee_name}, #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone_num}, #{job_level}, #{hire_date}, #{hire_type}, #{auth})
mapper.select: SELECT emp_seq.nextval FROM dual
mapper.update: update employee set employee_photo = #{employee_photo} where employee_num = #{employee_num} and employee_name = #{employee_name}
mapper.select: SELECT job_level, employee_num, store_num, auth, hire_type FROM employee WHERE store_num=#{store_num} AND job_level='점주' AND auth=2
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM employee WHERE employee_num=#{employee_num} and employee_name=#{employee_name} and resignation_day=#{resignation_day}
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET password = #{password} WHERE EMPLOYEE_NUM = #{employee_num}
